titleInfo.title: Joel and LaBreeska Hemphill Publicity Photo with Tracing Paper

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The image may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Black and white head-and-shoulders portrait of Joel and La Breeska Hemphill. The photo was released by Harper and Associates. A piece of tracing paper is taped to the photo. Handwritten on the paper are notes which say, "Reduce to 5 inches x 7 inches" "Could you adjust the contract to try to make this area appear white?" and "65 line screen." To view a poster that features the metal photoplate made from this photo, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/34680.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
